snippet: Jaime Ortiz-Patiño, a former president of the World Bridge Federation, died on Jan. 3 in Marbella, Spain. He was 82.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played in 1982 Bermuda Regional by Jaime Ortiz-Patino, former president of World Bridge Federation who died at age 82.
lead_paragraph: Jaime Ortiz-Patiño, a former president of the World Bridge Federation, died on Jan. 3 in Marbella, Spain. He was 82.

headline.seo: Bridge — Jaime Ortiz-Patiño at the 1982 Bermuda Regional
headline.main: Jaime Ortiz-Patiño at the 1982 Bermuda Regional
